JOB? Know your manners, fool. I'm the king!
Yes, are you blind? I'm standing right here in front of you.
That is just out-rageous.
You are the one who should offer me free items. But I could always promote you if you're really worthy it. And I have fire bugs too.
The former kings ruled from Celeres, but since this grand castle was built to my honour I decided to move here.
I named this castle to Castle Dine.
Lithaton is the grand continent which I rule. But it's not all. My powers reach to Dustwit aswell as Flantania Isle, and both Hagal and Gardar is under my command.
Zertic has served me before, but I know he dislikes me. He shows me respect and as long as he continues with that I am satisfied.
Doc? Is that what they call him these days? Well, Doc or not, he's a man of honour.
My grandfather knew Natalon.
My grandfather ruled this continent too. He lived in Celeres, though.
Long ago my grand grandfather sent settlers to Dustwit, and look what they have developed today. The city Tha'Reen has become great.
Celeres is a very interesting city, although I personally prefer Casteldine. All the kings before me ruled from Celeres.
Adanac is to me a quite unimportant city. It is isolated and not interesting.
Ashbere is the elven tree city. It's impressive even though it's built by our enemies. The elves from Ashbere are very aggressive, but they constitute no threat to us.
The outlaws from Goldtol thinks they can escape my troops. We are still raiding that camp now and then to clean up a little.
Don't you know my name, fool?
Hail me.
A queen? Where?
Dark magic is nothing we shall discuss now. Only if you bring me true marks of evil, I will destroy them and give you the honour you are worthy of.
I know only one person who is capable of dealing with the true secrets of magic, and even though I dislike him I must agree with that he knows what he does. Zertic is his name.
If you bring me marks of evil I will praise your name forever, |PLAYERNAME|.
We fight evil, don't we?
He is certainly amusing.
I recently asked him to be my royal astrolog. He knows much about our world, too.
May he rest in peace.
King Celero III was my father and the former king.
King Flantan is famous because of Flantania Isle which he founded.

John Riddle lived here long ago. He invented a cipher known as the Celix Cipher. Not many people knows how to decode it, but I think some minotaur math genious did it. He was last known to live in Ravenclaw.
Do you have a... snare? That you wish to sell to me? I bid 55000 gold coins!
Thank you!
|PLAYERNAME|. Goodbye.
Noone walks out on me.
